item.description: About Me | Contact | Curriculum Vitae About Me I am a computational ecologist by training and a data visualization designer by heart. I use statistical and simulation models to answer questions related to the movement ecology of animals and the dynamics of populations, communities and diseases in space and time. Data visualizations are mostly done in R using the package ggplot2 from the amazing tidyverse which I use for all kinds of data preparation.

TidyTuesday | Scientific Figures A collection of data visualizations I’ve produced for scientific publications and fun using the ggplot2 package in the programming language R. Click on a image to enlarge it. #TidyTuesday challenges #TidyTuesday is a weekly data project aimed at the R ecosystem with an emphasis on understanding how to summarize and arrange data to make meaningful charts with ggplot2, tidyr, dplyr and other tools in the tidyverse ecosystem.
